ai.summary: A short, easy 1.2 km hike in the United Kingdom suitable for beginners and families, offering gentle terrain and light scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly gentle footpaths and grassy tracks with occasional compact surfaces. Expect well-defined paths, wet conditions possible, and uneven ground in places.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather forecast and daylight hours before you go. Wear sturdy, comfortable footwear and bring waterproof layers. Carry water and a small snack. Stay on marked paths, heed any signs, and be mindful of other users. Let someone know your plans and have a means of contact in case of emergency.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or boots with good grip
Map or offline GPS on a phone
Hat and sun protection (on sunny days)
Fully charged phone and emergency contact info
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March to October) for the most comfortable conditions; can be done year-round with proper gear and daylight.

seo.title: Crowan BR 56 Ground Turth – Easy 1.2 km UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Explore Crowan BR 56 Ground Turth, an easy 1.2 km hike in the UK. Learn about the terrain, safety tips, gear, and the best seasons for this short countryside walk.
